conbody.p: Electronics consists of three single Coil pick-ups, which can be selected over a rocker switch. While the first Stratocaster possessed a switch, so the pick-ups could be selected separately, in the modern ones the five-way switches one introduced. Also, popular combinations of the neck or bar pick-up can be selected with the middle pickup to produce an "out-of-phase" - sound, also with switching a "hollower" a sound is available. One volume control and two tone controls help shape the sound. This circuit has ample clearance for modifications and changes, which, through the years enabled the creation of many series and special models.

example.title: Stratocaster
example.p: This is a picture of my Fender Stratocaster.
